chargeHist.descr: Possess Drug Paraphernalia to Manufacture, Compound, Convert, Produce, or Store Methamphetamine

result.execSummary:
The defendant Lisa Xiong was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia to Manufacture, Compound, Convert, Produce, or Store Methamphetamine, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(3)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Case Called: 1:41 pm
INCLUDES 14CF07 AND 14CF555.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo. Defendant appears in person and with Atty Paul Goetz.
Corrections to be made to the PSI are stated on the record.
State makes sentencing argument.
Atty Goetz makes sentencing argument. 
Defendant makes statement. 
Court addresses the parties.

COURT ORDERS:
14CF07:
Ct. 1 (Manuf/Deliver Amphetamine (>3-10g)>> 38 Months WSPS- 14 Months IC and 24 Months ES, Concurrent. Court finds 259 days credit. CONDITIONS: Absolute sobriety from Controlled Substances, No possession of drugs/paraphernalia, Maintain Full time employment/school, Counseling as recommended, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge and including $400 Buy Money, DNA Sample. Eligible for programming.

Ct. 2 (Possession of Methamphetamine)>> 3 Years WSPS- 1 Year IC and 2 Years ES, Concurrent. Court finds 259 days credit. CONDITIONS: Absolute sobriety from Controlled Substances, No possession of drugs/paraphernalia, Maintain Full time employment/school, Counseling as recommended, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. Eligible for programming.

14CF555:
Ct. 2 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia to Manufacture, Compound, Convert, Produce, or Store Methamphetamine)>> 38 Months WSPS- 14 Months IC and 24 Months ES, Concurrent. Court finds 259 days credit. CONDITIONS: Absolute sobriety from Controlled Substances, No possession of drugs/paraphernalia, Maintain Full time employment/school, Counseling as recommended, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. Eligible for programming.

PSI TO BE SEALED.
REMANDED TO WSPS.
